===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[pour]] water on; to [[rinse]]; to [[flush]]; to [[wash]]
#* {{zh-x|我 觉得 我 得{děi} 回家 '''冲''' 个 澡。|I think I'll go home and have a shower.}}
#* {{zh-x|許多 房屋 被 洪水 '''沖'''走 了。|A lot of houses were '''washed''' away by the flood.}}
#* {{zh-x|他 用 水 '''冲''' 了 把 脸，然后 刷牙。|He '''splashed''' water on his face, then brushed his teeth.}}
# to [[infuse]]; to make drinks
#* {{zh-x|冲 茶|to make tea}}
#* {{zh-x|冲 咖啡|to make coffee}}
#* {{zh-x|给 你 的 咖啡，按 你 的 口味 '''冲''' 的。|Here's your coffee, just the way you like it.}}
# to [[soar]]; to [[rise]]; to [[shoot up]]
# {{qualifier|of water}} to [[dash]] against; to [[collide]] with
# to [[develop]] {{qualifier|a film}}
#* {{zh-x|冲 胶卷|to develop a film}}
